Text: Cuts to Peoples Gas ANR Contract on gas days May th t h and stTradingpst Jason Peoples Gas ANR Contract was cut on May th th and st All cuts were tied to Northern Border contract RF On the th Peoples lost MMBtu For the th the cut was MMBtu The st the cut was MMBtu for Peoples Gas North Shore for the st was cut MMBtu MMBtu on ANR contract and MMBtu on ANR Contract For each day affected Peoples andor North Shore will reduce its SIQ purchase Jer The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential andor privileged material Any review retransmission dissemination or other use of or taking of any action in reliance upon this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient is prohibited If you received this in error please contact the sender and delete the material from any computer

FW May st cuts on NB ANR East Joliet Cc Tradingpst Jason Peoples will reduce its SIQ purchase for the st regarding the MMBtu cut Jer From Trinidad Jeanette Email Sent Thursday May AM To Akkerman Antje Blackman Nate Email Fitzgerald Richard J Email Holler Sonia R Isais Irene Slechta Jerry Wear Dave Cc Trinidad Jeanette Email Subject May st cuts on NB ANR East Joliet The following are the final reduction totals for May Intraday NoBorder Enron contract Rf was cut by dth Volume went from to Therefore deliveries from Enron North America to PGLC went from to ANR East Joliet Peoples contract was cut by dth Volume went from to Therefore PGLC system supply was cut by dth Volume went from to Jeanette Trinidad Gas Transportation Services The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential andor privileged material Any review retransmission dissemination or other use of or taking of any action in reliance upon this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient is prohibited If you received this in error please contact the sender and delete the material from any computer

FW May st cuts on ANR North Shore Cc Tradingpst Besides the MMBtu cut there was a MMBtu cut for the st The reason Jeanette is not reporting it is because North Shore took that supply to storage Jeanette does not see that nomination She only confirms cuts the citygate North Shore reduced its SIQ purchase of for the st by MMBtu The revised SIQ amount is Jer From Trinidad Jeanette Email Sent Thursday May AM To Blackman Nate Email Fitzgerald Richard J Email Isais Irene Slechta Jerry Thomas Lilian Hayes Robert C Cc Trinidad Jeanette Email Subject May st cuts on ANR North Shore The following are the final reduction totals for May Intraday ANR North Shore contract was cut by dth Volume went from to Therefore NSG PGLC system supply was cut by dth Volume went from to Jeanette Trinidad Gas Transportation Services The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential andor privileged material Any review retransmission dissemination or other use of or taking of any action in reliance upon this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient is prohibited If you received this in error please contact the sender and delete the material from any computer

Final cuts regarding gas days May th thru May stTradingpst Jason The following reductions will be deducted from Peoples daily SIQ purchase of MMBtuday For the th our Transportation Services area reports that Peoples was cut by MMBtu TTP and Border Will County to ANR Contract Here is a revised breakdown of the th PGL Baseload PGL SIQ minus PGL DIQ Revised Total Purchase Peoples North Shore Revised Will County Upstream Volume Sell Back to Enron Gas Daily minus Enron TTP Net For the th Peoples was cut by MMBtu TTP and Border Will County to ANR Contract The th should now look like the following PGL Baseload PGL SIQ minus PGL DIQ Revised Total Purchase Peoples North Shore Revised Will County Upstream Volume Sell Back to Enron Gas Daily minus Enron TTP Net For the st Peoples was cut by MMBtu TTP and Border Will County to ANR Contract The st should now look like the following PGL Baseload PGL SIQ minus PGL DIQ Revised Total Purchase Peoples North Shore Revised Will County Upstream Volume Sell Back to Enron Gas Daily minus Enron TTP Net Call me if you have questions Jer The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential andor privileged material Any review retransmission dissemination or other use of or taking of any action in reliance upon this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient is prohibited If you received this in error please contact the sender and delete the material from any computer

Sell Back for gas day May thTradingpst Jason Peoples will continue to sell back for the last two days of May Gas Daily minus Im sending you this Email to confirm our intentions Jer The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential andor privileged material Any review retransmission dissemination or other use of or taking of any action in reliance upon this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient is prohibited If you received this in error please contact the sender and delete the material from any computer

Cut on ANR to Peoples Gas Contract Cc Tradingpst Jason I verbally confirmed the cut that occurred for gas day May th with Irene Isais of our Gas Transportation Services department Peoples ANR contract was cut by MMBtu throughout the May th gas day The supply was cut because PGL Gas Supply was not told by Enron North America that the Northern Border supply Will County had been reallocated on different contracts All four GISB cycles were exercised in an attempt to receive the entire but since the contract mismatch was not corrected until the final cycle Peoples lost MMBtu for the day Peoples reduced its SIQ purchase from to for gas day May th Jer The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential andor privileged material Any review retransmission dissemination or other use of or taking of any action in reliance upon this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient is prohibited If you received this in error please contact the sender and delete the material from any computer

FW Cut on ANR to Peoples Gas Contract Cc Tradingpst Jason The May th cut to Peoples ANR contract is now MMBtu ANR revised its morning allocation It now confirms for Peoples Gas for May th The previous revised delivered amount of has been adjusted upward by to Peoples will reduce its SIQ purchase by Therefore of SIQ becomes for May th Jer From Slechta Jerry Sent Thursday May AM To Jason Williams Cc Barbara Dillard Radous Cora Pendergrass Mark Mixon Holler Sonia R Wear Dave Akkerman Antje Thomas Lilian Hayes Robert C Subject Cut on ANR to Peoples Gas Contract Jason I verbally confirmed the cut that occurred for gas day May th with Irene Isais of our Gas Transportation Services department Peoples ANR contract was cut by MMBtu throughout the May th gas day The supply was cut because PGL Gas Supply was not told by Enron North America that the Northern Border supply Will County had been reallocated on different contracts All four GISB cycles were exercised in an attempt to receive the entire but since the contract mismatch was not corrected until the final cycle Peoples lost MMBtu for the day Peoples reduced its SIQ purchase from to for gas day May th Jer The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential andor privileged material Any review retransmission dissemination or other use of or taking of any action in reliance upon this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient is prohibited If you received this in error please contact the sender and delete the material from any computer

FW REVISION NB Final reductions for June Tradingpst Jason Contract RF was cut by MMBtu for gas day June rd Peoples Gas will reduce its SIQ purchase by The SIQ amount goes from to Jer From Isais Irene Sent Monday June AM To Akkerman Antje Blackman Nate Email Fitzgerald Richard J Email Holler Sonia R Slechta Jerry Trinidad Jeanette Email Wear Dave Thomas Lilian Hayes Robert C Pendergrass Cora Lewis Josephine Isais Irene Cc Mantilla Wilson Subject REVISION NB Final reductions for June REVISION My apologies for the error Volume cut on contract Rf was dth NOT dth The following are the final reduction totals for June Intraday NoBorder Enron contract Rf was cut by dth Volume went from to Therefore deliveries from Enron North America to PGLC went from to Irene Isais Peoples Energy The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential andor privileged material Any review retransmission dissemination or other use of or taking of any action in reliance upon this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient is prohibited If you received this in error please contact the sender and delete the material from any computer

MMBtuper day cut to Peoples from March th through March th Cc Tradingpst Jason Irene Isais of our Transportation Services department notified me that Enron North America was cut MMBtu per day from March th through March th The dekatherm cut occurred on Trunkline Peoples will reduce the baseload FOM priced quantity on the th and th by MMBtu It will cut the DIQ amount of by dekatherm on gas day March th The FOM price was greater than Gas Daily on the th and th while Gas Daily was the higher price on the th Jer The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential andor privileged material Any review retransmission dissemination or other use of or taking of any action in reliance upon this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient is prohibited If you received this in error please contact the sender and delete the material from any computer

FW Intraday Final Reductions on NBTradingpst Jason Peoples was cut for gas day June during the intraday cycle on Northern Border As displayed below the amount cut was MMBtu Peoples will reduce its SIQ purchase for the day by The amount goes from SIQ to SIQ Jer From Isais Irene Sent Wednesday June AM To Akkerman Antje Blackman Nate Email Fitzgerald Richard J Email Holler Sonia R Slechta Jerry Trinidad Jeanette Email Wear Dave Thomas Lilian Hayes Robert C Pendergrass Cora Lewis Josephine Cc Mantilla Wilson Subject Intraday Final Reductions on NB The following are the final reduction totals on No Boarder for June Intraday No Border Enron N A contract RF was cut by dth and contract X was cut by dth A total cut of dth Therefore deliveries from Enron N A to PGLC went from to Irene Isais Peoples Energy The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential andor privileged material Any review retransmission dissemination or other use of or taking of any action in reliance upon this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient is prohibited If you received this in error please contact the sender and delete the material from any computer

Gas Day of April th Cc Tradingpst Jason MMBtu was cut after the final GISB cycle on ANR Contract The cut was the result of Northern Border confirming the incorrect number during the timely evening and intraday cycles The supply Will County for Peoples went from to Peoples Gas reduced its SIQ purchase from Enron North America The purchase went from to Jer The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential andor privileged material Any review retransmission dissemination or other use of or taking of any action in reliance upon this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient is prohibited If you received this in error please contact the sender and delete the material from any computer

FW Gas Day of April th Cc Tradingpst Jason The MMBtu was cut Will County per conversation with our Gas Transportation Services area Jeanette Trinidad of the area said ANR told her when they tried to confirm the gas with Border Will County the lesser number was confirmed Also the MMBtu cut for the th on Border contract RF will be taken away from Peoples Gas Peoples will reduce its SIQ amount of to Jer From Slechta Jerry Sent Friday April AM To Jason Williams Cc Mark Mixon Subject Gas Day of April th Jason MMBtu was cut after the final GISB cycle on ANR Contract The cut was the result of Northern Border confirming the incorrect number during the timely evening and intraday cycles The supply Will County for Peoples went from to Peoples Gas reduced its SIQ purchase from Enron North America The purchase went from to Jer The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential andor privileged material Any review retransmission dissemination or other use of or taking of any action in reliance upon this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient is prohibited If you received this in error please contact the sender and delete the material from any computer

Cuts for Gas Days May and May Border Will County for People s Gas Cc Tradingpst Jason Peoples Gas ANR Contract was cut on gas days May st and nd by and dekatherms respectively The baseload volume became for the st and for the nd The cuts were due to nomination mismatches between Northern Border and ANR For example the Enron nomination on Northern Border for contract RF was while the quantity communicated to PGL Gas Supply for that contract was An attempt to restore the gas was made during the intraday cycles but not all of the supply was confirmed Peoples will reduce its SIQ purchase on the st and nd by and dekatherms respectively Jer The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential andor privileged material Any review retransmission dissemination or other use of or taking of any action in reliance upon this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient is prohibited If you received this in error please contact the sender and delete the material from any computer

FW Borderline NoticeTradingpst Here is the notice allowing only firm transportation from Harper to Manhattan Jer From Bryan RobertSMTPRobert NRONcom Sent Tuesday May AM To Adams Jean Begley Mark Begley Mark Blair Jean Blair Lynn Brady Kevin Brodeur Stephane Bryan Randy Bryan Robert Bryan Robert Carr James Carter Pamela Coburn Scott Floyd Jodie Fonda Bill Fuentes Daryll Griffith Jackie Heal Kevin Hedstrom Peggy Homan Rita Johnson Robert Johnson Robert Miller Paul Muzzy Charles T Nacey Sheila uncorcom Neppl Ray Pandya Bhavna Piazze Tara Rood George Shade Marge Smith George F Smith Rhonda Strom Colin Strom Colin Wakefield Karen Walden Shirley Watt Ryan Weakly Judith Weakly Judith Willimon Ted Willimon Ted Floyd Jodie Blair Lynn January Steven Subject Borderline Notice Maize Bkgrdjpg Borderline No May Northern Borders Gas Control Department has issued a capacity alert for the Harper to Manhattan segment effective Wednesday May Record heat combined with expected high load factors dictates that Northern Border schedule only firm transportation in this segment for this gas day Gas Control will evaluate the east end capacity situation on a day to day basis and will remove the capacity alert when operating conditions improve Robert Bryan Market Services ext The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential andor privileged material Any review retransmission dissemination or other use of or taking of any action in reliance upon this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient is prohibited If you received this in error please contact the sender and delete the material from any computer Maize Bkgrdjpg
